short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances functionality of the Workiva web applications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Workiva Chrome extension empowers people to leverage the context menu to perform Cut, Copy and Paste actions in Workiva applications with ease; all without forcing the use of keyboard shortcuts. This is a common interaction people are used to in many applications. Installing it can improve workflow and remove any need to message limitations to cut/copy/paste actions.
